about_the_game:
Get 15 heroes including crossovers. The ultimate upgrade!
Content included：
Heroes - Macalon, Seaya, Heracles, Cupid, Sandy, Magician, Tina, Chilli, Kamiki Yuri, Mr.5, Derek, Lan, Tong, Thanatos
Crossover Hero - Tarara

If you already own some of these heroes when you purchase this DLC, you will receive an equal number of repeated heroes in Aura Chest as a bonus switch.
detailed_description:
Get 15 heroes including crossovers. The ultimate upgrade!
Content included：
Heroes - Macalon, Seaya, Heracles, Cupid, Sandy, Magician, Tina, Chilli, Kamiki Yuri, Mr.5, Derek, Lan, Tong, Thanatos

If you already own some of these heroes when you purchase this DLC, you will receive an equal number of repeated heroes in Aura Chest as a bonus switch.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
